1088251937.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

items.description: Filters allow data objects to specify test criteria which allows their use. Filters can be defined by a single object of type (Filter Test), an array of tests, collection groups, or a combination of these objects.

AND.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

NOT.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

OR.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

all.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

all_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must pass in order for the group to pass.

any.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

any_of.description: Evaluates tests in the group, one or more must pass in order for the group to pass.

none_of.description: Evaluates all tests in the group, all must fail in order for the group to pass.

1088251937.title: Filter Group

2176758423.description: Scatter probability represented by an expression or an object with a numerator and denominator.
2176758423.title: Scatter Chance

2195141389.description: Controls the scatter distribution of a particular object.

coordinate_eval_order.description: The order in which coordinates will be evaluated. Should be used when a coordinate depends on another. If omitted, defaults to "xzy". Supported orders are defined by "Coordinate Evaluation Order".
coordinate_eval_order.title: Coordinate Evaluation Order

iterations.description: Number of scattered positions to generate.

scatter_chance.description: Probability that this scatter will occur. Not evaluated each iteration; either no iterations will run, or all will.

x.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

y.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

z.description: Distribution for the coordinate (evaluated each iteration).

2195141389.title: Scatter Params

identifier.description: The name of this feature rule in the format 'namespace_name:rule_name'. 'rule_name' must match the filename.

places_feature.description: Named reference to the feature controlled by this rule.

4150871210.description: Represents the scatter distrubution over a coordinate (x/y/z), can also be built by an expression.

distribution.description: Type of distribution. Supported distributions are defined by "Random Distribution Type".
distribution.title: Random Distribution Type

extent.description: Lower and upper bound (inclusive) of the scatter range, as an offset from the input point to scatter around.

grid_offset.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the offset along this axis.

step_size.description: When the distribution type is grid, defines the distance between steps along this axis.

4150871210.title: Coordinate Range

domain.description: The domain the test should be performed in.

subject.description: The subject of this filter test.

test.description: The name of the test to apply.

value.description: The value being compared with the test.

minecraft:biome_filter.description: List of filter tests to determine which biomes this rule will attach to.

placement_pass.description: When the feature should be placed relative to others. Earlier passes in the list are guaranteed to occur before later passes. Order is not guaranteed within each pass.

conditions.description: Parameters to control where and when the feature will be placed.

description.description: Identifier for the Feature Rule and Feture to place.

distribution.description: Parameters controlling the initial scatter of the feature.
